request.description:
Retrieve all dropdown options for Panchanga calendar fields.

Returns 9 arrays:
✅ samvatsarams (60 year cycle names)
✅ ayanams (Uttarayanam/Dakshinayanam)
✅ ruthus (6 seasons)
✅ masams (12 lunar months)
✅ pakshams (Shukla/Krishna Paksham)
✅ tithis (15 lunar days)
✅ vaasarams (7 days of week)
✅ nakshatrams (27 birth stars)
✅ rasis (12 zodiac signs)

Expected Response:
- Status: 200 OK
- success: true
- data: Object with all 9 arrays

item.name: Sankalpam Finder

request.description:
⭐ NEW ENDPOINT - Find Sankalpam for a given date, time, and city.

This is the simplified 3-field form that calls external API to calculate Panchanga.

Request Format:
✅ date: YYYY-MM-DD format (e.g., 2026-02-24)
✅ time: HH:MM format, 24-hour (e.g., 18:30)
✅ city: City name (e.g., New York, Mumbai, Sydney)

Expected Response:
- Status: 200 OK
- success: true
- data: {
    requestId: string,
    date: string,
    time: string,
    city: string,
    sunrise: string,
    sunset: string,
    validUntil: string,
    panchanga: {
      samvatsaram, ayanam, ruthu, masam,
      paksham, tithi, vaasaram, nakshatram, rasi
    }
  }
Example request for Mumbai, India timezone.

❌ Test validation error for invalid date format.

Required pattern: YYYY-MM-DD
Valid: 2026-02-24, 2026-12-31
Invalid: 24/02/2026, 02-24-2026

Expected Response:
- Status: 422 Unprocessable Entity
- success: false
- errors: {"date": ["Date must be in YYYY-MM-DD format"]}

❌ Test validation error for invalid time.

Time pattern: HH:MM (24-hour format, 0-23 hours)
Valid: 00:00, 18:30, 23:59
Invalid: 25:00, 10:60, 24:00

Expected Response:
- Status: 422 Unprocessable Entity
- success: false
- errors: {"time": ["Time must be in HH:MM format (24-hour)"]}

❌ Test validation error for missing city.

City requirements:
- Required: Yes
- Min length: 2 characters
- Max length: 100 characters

Expected Response:
- Status: 422 Unprocessable Entity
- success: false
- errors: {"city": ["City is required"]}

❌ Test validation error for city name too short.

Expected Response:
- Status: 422 Unprocessable Entity
- errors: {"city": ["City must be between 2 and 100 characters"]}
